name: Young Wasteland Dragon
movement: burrow 20 ft., climb 40 ft., fly 70 ft., walk 40 ft.
description: The Young Wasteland Dragon is a large dragon with potent abilities and a chaotic nature. Its body is likely covered in scales that reflect its wasteland environment.
memorable: Features Warped Energy Breath, a devastating area attack.
goals: To dominate its territory and eliminate threats.
relations: May be encountered alongside other wasteland creatures or powerful chaotic beings.
environment: Typically found in barren wasteland areas or ruins.
strengths: High physical strength and constitution, making it durable and capable in melee combat.
weaknesses: Moderate intelligence and wisdom, making it susceptible to manipulation.
attacks: Can make a bite attack and claw attacks, dealing significant damage to enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Warped Energy Breath, dealing 49 force damage in a line to multiple foes.
senses: Has blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing it to detect hidden foes.
skills: Skilled in perception and stealth, enhancing its capability to navigate its environment unnoticed.
additional_information: Exceptional mobility with flying and climbing abilities.
Can perform multiattacks with its bite and claws.
test_queries: large dragon with devastating breath attack
wasteland dragon immune to force damage
